introduction.main:
Welcome to the Source Academy playground!

The book Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs, JavaScript EditLinks.textbook uses JavaScript sublanguages that we call [_Source_](${Links.sourceDocs}).
introduction.hotkeys: In the editor on the left, you can use the [_Ace keyboard shortcuts_](${Links.aceHotkeys}) and the [_Source Academy keyboard shortcuts_](${Links.sourceHotkeys}).
